comments: No other terms in first 8000000 terms of A046895. [From _T. D. Noe_, Mar 11 2009]
mathematica: s = 0; Reap[ Do[s = s + SquaresR[4, n]; If[IntegerQ[Sqrt[s]], Print[{n, s}]; Sow[s]], {n, 0, 5*10^6}]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 02 2012 *)
author: _Vinay Vaishampayan_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: No other terms in first 200000 terms of A046895, though sequence is believed to be infinite.
